constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 两个数组合并后的元素必须全部不同（无重复元素）
constraints.formal: ∀ i, j (1 ≤ i, j ≤ n), a_{i,1}, ..., a_{i,m}, a_{j,1}, ..., a_{j,m} are distinct

constraints.name: pairwise_exclusion
constraints.description: 选择的两个数组不能有相同的元素
constraints.formal: ∀ i, j (1 ≤ i, j ≤ n, i ≠ j), a_{i,k} ≠ a_{j,l} for all 1 ≤ k, l ≤ m
